pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Fast and Versatile SVM Package // Support vector machines (SVMs) and related kernel-based learning algorithms are a well- known class of machine learning algorithms, for non- parametric classification and regression. liquidSVM is an implementation of SVMs whose key features are: fully integrated hyper- parameter selection, extreme speed on both small and large data sets, inclusion of a variety of different classification and regression scenarios, and full flexibility for experts.
